data.title: I'm a local Scientologist from PA
data.text:
I’ve lived in CL for 11 years & have seen downtown CL expand greatly. My husband & I own a health care clinic in PA & travel back and forth.  I don’t work for the church; I’m a parishioner & I volunteer @ the Scn Info Ctr. giving tours of this bldg. & our 6 humanitarian programs around the corner.  It’s a beautiful, restored historical bldg. built in 1918 & worth seeing. The Ctr. provides answers to your questions about Scn in a friendly, safe environment. We don’t recruit; we simply answer your questions and, if you’d like, show you videos regarding our church activities. We also have social events, like piano concerts, which many of the local residents enjoy.

To answer the other reviewer’s question about uniforms, they’re for staff that works for the church. Uniforms help identify staff from parishioners like me and the diff color uniforms relate to the diff jobs each person holds. Uniforms make life easier & identify a team, like those in the service, some schools or restaurants.  So if you’re in CL, we invite you to stop in and say hi.

data.title: What Is with the uniforms?
data.text: You can't complain about the Scientologists having any crime in downtown clearwater every thing is neat and in order.

owner_response.author: Amber S, Manager at Church of Scientology, responded to this review
owner_response.text:
Hello Douglas,

Thank you for your remarks and reviews. 

To answer, "What's with the uniforms", the uniforms are worn by the staff of the Church of Scientology. Today there are 2,600 staff that work in the Clearwater area. The members of Church coming for Scientology services (classes and spiritual counselling) do not wear uniforms. It makes it easier to know who to go to for the services that way as there are about 4,500 members (parishioners) visiting from around the world at any time as well. 

Hope that answers your question, if not feel free to e-mail me at amber@cos.flag.org. 

Amber S. - Manager, Scientology Information Center
owner_response.title: Owner Response
